rows.label: qev040903_MSG0001
rows.name:
Is this Sylvalum? Muimui fell asleep in backpack,
and woke up here. Back of friend really is the only
way to travel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040903_MSG0002
rows.name: Thanks, friend! Muimui handle everything from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040903_MSG0004
rows.name:
All right, Sword of Legendaryness. Come out!
It no use trying to hide from Legen-daâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040903_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Muimui if something is wrong with the Legen-dar.

rows.label: qev040903_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Muimui if he has located the sword already.

rows.label: qev040903_MSG0006
rows.name: No, response is coming in loud and clear. But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040903_MSG0007
rows.name: Yes. And close by! Buuuuut to be more specific...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040903_MSG0008
rows.name:
there are three responses showing up!
Must be result of nasty cold and spores.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040903_MSG0009
rows.name:
Still, one of these three must be sword.
Muimui just have to try them one by one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040903_MSG0010
rows.name:
This may prove to be toughest trial yet,
but Muimui and friend will overcome it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040903_MSG0011
rows.name: Now, ONWARD! Sword calls out to be found![ST:wait ]
